sentences: This issue was first taken up by the SBSTA plenary on Friday, 10 June 2011.
SBSTA Chair Konaté noted agreement in Decision 1/CP.16 to establish a Technology Mechanism and terminate the Expert Group on Technology Transfer.
Informal consultations on the issue were subsequently conducted by Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Zitouni Ould-Dada (UK).
The SBSTA adopted conclusions on 16 June.
